entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as a person who is part of the Black family. He is described as throwing a medal into the rubbish sack and wrestling a golden ring from Kreacher's grip.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as a house-elf who is devoted to the Black family. He is described as attempting to smuggle things away and bursting into furious tears when Sirius takes something from him.

entities.name: harry

entities.name: mrs. weasley

entities.name: black crest
entities.description: The Black crest is mentioned as a symbol that appears on a golden ring. It is described as being passed down through generations of the Black family.
